name: Bot-E Builder
description:
Controls:

Move: A/D or Left Joystick
Jump: Space / Controller Y
Punch: E / Mouse0 / Controller A
Slam: Jump while in air

Start at the Bot-tem and now you're here. Escape from the lab you were build, but your creators forgot to finish attaching all your parts! Smash the bots sent to bring you back, and use their parts complete your construction.

only certain bots are vulnerable to certain attacks. Can you escape and become the best Bot-E Builder?
